description:
To try everything Brilliant has to offer for free for a full 30 days, visit http://www.brilliant.org/answerswithjoe and you’ll also get 20% off an annual premium subscription.

What is the shape of the universe? It’s kind-of an impossible question to answer. But thanks to studies of the cosmic microwave background radiation, we do have an idea of what spacetime is shaped like. And the answer is… strange.

Want to support the channel? Here's how:

You can listen to my podcast, Conversations With Joe on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Google Podcasts, or wherever you get your podcasts.
Spotify 👉 https://spoti.f
title: The True Shape Of The Universe May Surprise You
